channel.title: Prince Meta Solution: Remove the Assassin's 2 for 1 and add 1 use Frenzy
channel.description:
I saw this suggestion on the subreddit and thought it to be simple and seemingly effective.
Allowing the Assassin to Frenzy kill once per game will prevent D1 Prince claims and kill the Prince claim meta single-handedly. The Enforcer can keep his own Frenzy ability or be replaced with something else. Maybe he can take the 2 for 1 ability? Sounds OP.
If you DON'T like this idea -
Make it so the King's Execution pierces healing so Evil Kings can't fail on killing the Prince and be outed the next morning. This would also make Princes hesitant to claim.
If you DON'T like THIS idea -
Feel free to give your own that doesn't involve whispering.

item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Given possessor I don’t see the apostle change singlehandedly removing prince out. It helps but it isn’t that different from a poss game.

Also the odds of a starting apostle is 12.5% compared to EKing which is 35% and Possessor (which accomplishes the same effect as apostle) which is 33%

item.source: Prince Meta Solution: Remove the Assassin's 2 for 1 and add 1 use Frenzy

item.title: Prince Meta Solution: Remove the Assassin's 2 for 1 and add 1 use Frenzy
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
/no support, I’m a stinky meta supporter
There’s a difference between additons that let people break the meta, and additions that are made specifically to break A meta. One of them is a bad design.

If we don’t want people to follow the whisper the Prince, I think the solution lies within how that information gets transferred. I don’t think being evils being able to instakill any powerful claiming BD is the answer ~

Perhaps instead of Foresight, Mastermind could have an ability allowing them to access another player’s chat history for a day?

Some form of this ability could be applied to anyone.

The Frenzy idea, to me, just seems problematic.

Read full topic

item.title: Prince Meta Solution: Remove the Assassin's 2 for 1 and add 1 use Frenzy
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Sketch:

Make it so the King’s Execution pierces healing so Evil Kings can’t fail on killing the Prince and be outed the next morning. This would also make Princes hesitant to claim.

It used to be like this, but was reverted.

Overall suggestion #1 I think is good, and it’s nice and simple. I’d suggest giving the enforcer just a one shot kill, to mimic 2 for 1.

Read full topic
